title: How about a "Frostborn" or "Frozen" item which gives you mana and magic resist
body:
Hey Guys,

recently i thought about champions whom you can pretty practical buy items, that give you mana as, for example the Frozen Heart or the Frostborn Gauntlet. I for example thought about Blitzcrank, whose passive scales with his mana. So if you want to build him tanky against AD you can build these "Frost" items, but if you want to build tanky against AP you got to buy Banshee's or Spirit Visage. Those are nice items as well, but it would be awesome if there would be at least one item like the Gaunlet which costs about 2800 gold and gives you 60-70 magic resist, 400-500 mana and 10-20% cooldown reduction for example. This would make mana-based tanks (even tho there might not be that many), and tanks in general who want some pure magic resist, a bit more fun to play i think.

Thank you for reading, have a nice day

replies.body: A fourth spellblade for MR wouldn't be awful but I don't think it's necessary. Mana/MR items aren't a fantastic idea because they'll be mostly adding power to champions who don't need them.

{{item:3174}}  {{item:3222}} 

Not as high mr, but basically what your asking for... since top tanks are starting to build locket more, im sure flexibility can be made with these.

No thankyou, only a few people scale off mana.

Ryze does not need buffs by being able to build mana and magic resist at the same time, and Kassadin already has enough ease eating up magic damage.
